title: Genie

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You are able to grant one wish to your target at their request.
- You may not refuse a wish, **but may bend it as you please**. Before you grant the wish, you must wait for the game host to approve/refuse your interpretation of it. Only the game host will be able to refuse the wish being granted.
- Once a wish has been approved, it will be granted immediately at that time during the phase.
- The wish could do anything from send a secret message to somebody to changing someone's role to killing somebody.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game (and cause chaos)

desc:
Post 4071
You are a Genie that may grant wishes.
Every night you are randomly given a target. You will be given a chat with the player during that night and next day phase.
